Posts.Content: khollingsworth13 wrote: I'm nervous that my chemo is not strong enough.  I've heard from some that we need to take the adriamycin "red devil" since this cancer is more aggressive in young people like myself (30).  Has anyone had these thoughts?  I'm her2 negative, stage 1, no lymph node, onco score of 48, grade 3, hormone driven tumor.  Thanks anyone for answers! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taxotere and cytoxan for stage 1 grade 3? Anyone out there? khollingsworth13 TifJ
